attributes.title: Don’t download terrible app
attributes.review: So I decided to download the app to support our wonderful president who’s done so many GrEaT things for us and it took a minimum of 4 hours to download even though my WiFi is super fast aside from that once I got on the app it was super glitchy and it was barley working then my phone just randomly turned off and it would not start working and it stayed off for an hour when it finally turned on. 🟠🟠🟠

attributes.title: What was the reason 🤦‍♂️
attributes.review: My second cousins best friends neighbors dog sitter was a trump supporter and recommended this app to me. After looking at the app on my home screen, I knew it wasn’t for me. It gave me evil vibes and it needs to be summoned to the house of vibe for a ViBe check. President Trump got elected in 2016🧚‍♀️⭐️🥰✨let’s not let that happen again☀️✨💫☁️. The fact that the orange man did nothing but separate our country more and do everything but what he had on his campaign is astronomical.

attributes.title: Horrible terrible app
attributes.review: This app is so horrible and terrible 🤮made my phone glitch so much I couldn’t even go into the app, then it started making my phone glitch in all the other apps. My phone pretty much stopped working. Then, while my phone was plugged in to charge, the glitch triggered an electrical issue in my charger that spread into the outlet it was plugged into and started a house fire! That fire killed my parents , my dog, and my bird. This app ruined my life

attributes.title: My house burnt down
attributes.review: I decided and so did my other family that we wanted this app but it turns out that it is haunted because after we all downloaded it and it was on her phones are phones glitched and made our house burn down I blame it on this app because Trump has all of the excess abilities to make an app glitch it’s sad because I really wanted to like this app I suggest not getting  it because it can cause a house fire and a phone glitch

attributes.title: Cheetos
attributes.review: I opened this app intending to learn more about our president. Instead, I was faced  with the Cheetos snapchat filter and two beady eyes behind it. Truly terrifying. I thought this app was SERIOUS. A chance for me to support the man running our country but instead Cheetos face scared me half to death and forced me to throw my phone across the room thus shattering it. If I could recommend 0 stars I would. 0/10 recommend unless you enjoy looking at Cheetos. There’s lots of them on this app.

attributes.title: Donald Trump
attributes.review: I have always thought of Trump being such a great man , helping all of us fix things that Obama did but once I started really seeing him for who he is as I got older I’ve never felt so uncomfortable, unimportant , as a citizen ... Fix things that need to be fixed don’t take things out of the world that makes our generation happy just because you weren’t in the same place doesn’t mean we won’t be successful as we get older .

attributes.title: delete this app and yourself💕
attributes.review: I was a girl 🌸👧 in the village 🏤🏠doing alright😊👍Then I became🤷‍♀️😽 a princess overnight✨👑Now I gotta figure out 🤔😧how to do it right😽👌So much to learn 📕📚and see👀👋Up in the castle 🏰💕with my new family👨‍👩‍👧‍👧👑In a school📖🏫 that's just for royalty👩‍🎓😽A whole enchanted world🌏💫 is waiting for me👧🚫I'm so excited to be (Sofia The First)😽🙀I'm finding out😊👧 what being royal's all about😉👑 (Sofia The First)Making my way, 😊🥰it's an adventure everyday😝🌅 (Sofia) It's gonna be my time🧸😆😍

attributes.title: yikes
attributes.review:
I wanted to download this to see how my favorite president was doing, but after seeing all the invasive questions I now support Ace Watkins for the 2020 election.  He’s the prez we all need to get us in shape again and is excited to be the first gamer president if he gets elected!! From his Twitter: “My N64 is six years older than the Department of Homeland Security, and unlike DHS, my N64 still works and is necessary.” So Ace Watkins 2020!!!!!!😍✨✨🎮🎮

*obvs I know he’s a character who’s campaign is meant to be satirical

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT GET
attributes.review: Who programmed this? A two year old? It’s so glitchy and super confusing to navigate, even if I try to look past that it’s hoorible. I thought that I would see people like me on it but noooo, I wanted to see rascism and bigotry but ugh it’s horrible instead 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 do not download it’s horrible and a waste of your time it even gave me a virus that makes my phone really dark and it’s horrible and disappointing do not get it!!!!!!!!! 🤮🤮🙄🙄🙄😱😱🤬🤬😤😤😤🤡😳😳😳😳

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I decided to download this app in order to support our lord and savior the hot Cheeto, after downloading my phone immediately began getting spammed by politicians asking me if I was underage. I was SHOCKED angered some may even say I was trifled. After inputting my phone number on this app I started to feel sick and then I realized something... THE APP WASNT WEARING A COVID-19 MASK however I expected no less from our “pReSidEntttt” the Corona  virus grabbed me by the throat flung me across the wall and killed me. I am now a ghost. Beware 😔 !!!
